properties.value: Scorpions are monsters mainly located in free-to-play areas. They can be dangerous to low level players training Mining.

Scorpions are monsters mainly located in free-to-play areas. They can be dangerous to low level players training Mining.

The deadliest scorpion to free-to-play players is the scorpion in the Stronghold of Security (level 59).

Contents

  • 1 Locations
  • 2 Drops
    • 2.1 100%
    • 2.2 Tertiary
    • 2.3 Wilderness Slayer tertiary
  • 3 Changes
    • 3.1 Gallery (historical)
  • 4 See also
